translation.classSearchInstruction: Select a classification in the search box above.
translation.generalSettingsInstruction: Set the language and the bSDD environment.
translation.dictionarySelectionInstruction: Select the main dictionary and the filter dictionaries to use for the selection of objects. The main dictionary is used to select the objects. The filter dictionaries are used to filter the selection of objects.
translation.parameterMappingInstruction: Define the Revit type parameter in which to store the selected classes for this dictionary.
translation.sortFilterDictionariesInstruction: The dictionaries will be shown in this order anywhere in the application.
translation.entitySelectionInstruction: Select entities by using the dropdown at the top of the panel.
